properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 v4 c2 c1

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhuvilo Yesu ninnunchina yuddesamu bhaavamandu thalachi Yesuche jeevinchumu{/lang-eng}
{lang-tel}భువిలో యేసు నిన్నుంచిన యుద్దేశము భావమందు తలచి యేసుచే జీవించుము{/lang-tel}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Istaprakaramu manasu veedi nadachi kopa patruda vaguduve Rakshanya jeevitamondi santoshincha nanugraha kaalamide yani thelisi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ihamandu sevaku Yesu ninnu pilche nani thelisikonumu ghanamaina panini marachi nidrinchina pagalu gatinchaga nika nemi chetuvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Novahu kaalamuna noota iruvadi yendlu choochi lokamunu nashimpa jesenu krupatho neekidina aayussu ee etithone mugisina{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mundu Irmiyaa Hananyaaku thelipina etane mrutipondenu ye samayamu neeku sontha manakumu ee etane neevu maranichavachunu{/lang-eng}
